title: Switch Pro Leaked! Xbox/Bethesda E3 Announced! - Kinda Funny Games Daily 05.27.21
description:
Blessing and Tim tackle a HUGE news day. Let's talk about Nintendo's Switch Pro details, Xbox and Bethesda's E3 presentation, PlayStation's marketing plan, and SONIC THE MUHFUGGIN HEDGEHOG BABY.

Time Stamps - 
00:00:00 - Start
00:01:40 - Housekeeping
SO MUCH IS HAPPENING TODAY.
We just reacted to Sonic Central. Me and Tim’s reactions will be up on Youtube for you to check out.
Right after this episode of KFGD, we’re reacting to the new Cobra Kai trailer.
At 12 noon, there’s a Dying Light 2 stream and we’re reacting to that live.
Then at 2pm pt we’re reacting live to the Horizon Forbidden West State of Play. That’s all going down right here on Twitch.tv/KindaFunnyGames
The reactions don’t stop there, tomorrow we’re reacting to Far Cry 6’s presentation at 9:30 am.
Tonight at 5:30 pm PT, Greg’s hosting another episode of Presence of Mind for Cloud 9 with Alanah and Kahlief. This is their every other week show about mental health, and we’ll be streaming it on twitch.tv/kindafunnygames!
Thank you to our Patreon Producers: Black Jack & Tom Bock
The Roper Report  -
00:05:00 - Nintendo Plans Upgraded Switch Replacement as Soon as September - Takashi Mochizuki & Debby Wu @ Bloomberg
00:18:07 - Xbox and Bethesda Games E3 showcase coming June 13! - Michael McWhertor @ Polygon
00:23:06 - There's loads of interesting info in Sony's PlayStation investor relations document! - Wesley Yin-Poole @ Eurogamer
00:37:00 - Ad
00:38:33 - Borderlands 3 is getting crossplay support, but not on PlayStation - Tom Warren @ The Verge
00:42:08 - Will more big games, new and old NOT going cross play possibly cause PlayStation to end their greedy tactic? - Best Friends Q:The Nano Biologist
00:46:55 - Sonic Central stream celebrated the game’s 30th anniversary - Nibellion on Twitter
00:54:30 - BlizzCon 2021 has been canceled - Jay Peters @ The Verge
00:55:40 - Dragon Quest 12 Officially Announced - Luke Reilly @ IGN
00:01:00 - Out today
01:01:43 - You‘re Wrong
Tomorrow’s Hosts: Greg and Blessing
